abstract: The buyers, Discover Financial Services and Sallie Mae, will pick up billions of dollars in student loans.
snippet: The buyers, Discover Financial Services and Sallie Mae, will pick up billions of dollars in student loans.
lead_paragraph: Nearly two years after Citigroup received a second government bailout and was ordered by regulators to shrink, the bank agreed on Friday to sell its student lending business in two parts, to Discover Financial Services and the lender Sallie Mae.

headline.main: Citigroup to Sell Unit That Lends to Students
headline.print_headline: Citigroup To Sell Unit That Lends To Students
